author: woonsan
msg: JS2-1180: Adding geronimo-javamail_1.4_provider because we cannot send an email without it.
FYI, to replace the javamail by geronimo-javamail, we need both geronimo-javamail_1.4_spec and geronimo-javamail_1.4_provider.
Also, improve the test case to verify this.
